overview: Arnaouti and Bassiouni are conmen who fall in love with  Souad and Nawal who are also con-artists. They decide to marry each other. On the wedding day, the dancer Elham finds out the truth about the group, which makes  Arnaouti and Bassiouni repent and turn the villa into a hotel but Souad and Nawal have other plans.
title: The Swindlers
